title: Camping equipment sales in the U.S. - sleeping bags 2011
yAxis: Equipment sales in million U.S. dollars
summary: This statistic shows the U.S. equipment sales in 2010 , and a forecast for 2011 .
In 2010 , the equipment sales was valued at 191.76 million U.S. dollars .
